attributes.action: Expose the full extent of the redacted MPs' expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The blacked-out sections of the claims are not mainly because of national security but to disguise the extent of devious dishonesty of the MPs. This has been amply demonstrated by revelations from the Daily Telegraph.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
